page.title: 11High Littleton Association.
page.content: In March 1984 two teenagers came to the{High Littleton}district councillor and said that they had nothing to do in their spare time and were bored. They asked for help. The councillor suggested that they should rally support for the building of a village hall.Some time later she went around the village carrying a sandwich board advertising a meeting about a village hall.Later five or six people volunteered for a steering committee. In November there was a survey carried out.This asked for family details, activities followed at the moment, what activities you would like to follow if they were available, and if you were willing to help.This is how the{High Littleton and Hallatrow {Community Association} was formed.
